AgriGuru: AI-Powered Farming Assistant

Revolutionizing Indian agriculture with the power of artificial intelligence and satellite technology. AgriGuru empowers farmers, agronomists, and enthusiasts with actionable insights, crop recommendations, real-time weather, government schemes, and moreâ€”all in a single, beautifully designed platform.

Why AgriGuru?
Agriculture is the backbone of India, yet millions of farmers struggle with unpredictable weather, poor crop planning, and limited access to expert advice. We built AgriGuru to bridge this gapâ€”combining AI, data, and user-friendly design to deliver personalized, reliable, and actionable information at every step of the farming journey. Our vision is to enable every farmer to make smarter decisions, boost productivity, and embrace sustainable, organic practices for a greener tomorrow.

Our Mission:
To democratize access to advanced agri-tech, empower rural communities, and create a thriving ecosystem where technology and tradition work hand-in-hand. With AgriGuru, you get the best of AI recommendations, satellite insights, government support, and expert tipsâ€”right at your fingertips.

Key Features
